channel.title: Rsc 224 [Data]
channel.description:
Well if you look at the new rsc clients you will notice they have added a new cache format, preety funny if you ask me they are just using the same format to store the bzip data in as rs2. anyway i was researching the client abit and notice runescape are complete morons. reason why.
Old rsc: Downloads data from say classic2.runescape.com/data/models36.jag Lastest rsc Downloads data from http://classic2.runescape.com/content9_1
As you see they have not changed much only the way its named out, but as anyone would no with a basic knowlage of the anything they would see that the data what is getting downloaded is the client's storeage data. so i was wondering why the hell rs downloading the data files while there cache is not layed out like that anymore anyway one thing leads to a other
Before the data downloads the client checks if you have got the right crc32 keys say just for example your cache crc32 keys are 1, and then the client requests http://classic2.runescape.com/contentcrcsLOL <- contains the new crc32 keys. and there keys are 2 it will download the new cache files
Anyway so rs just downloads the new data files and then FROM the client injects the data files into the cache. morons
[code]Name Jagex library http://classic2.runescape.com/content3_5 Name Configuration http://classic2.runescape.com/content0_2 Name 2d graphics http://classic2.runescape.com/content8_f Name people and monsters http://classic2.runescape.com/content1_1 Name member graphics http://classic2.runescape.com/content2_2 Name Textures http://classic2.runescape.com/content11_7 Name 3d models http://classic2.runescape.com/content9_f Name map http://classic2.runescape.com/content4_f Name members map http://classic2.runescape.com/content5_6 Name landscape http://classic2.runescape.com/content6_f Name members landscape http://classic2.runescape.com/content7_3 Name Sound effects http://classic2.runescape.com/content10_f[/code] [center][img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/default/images/warnmute.gif[/img] T_x b muted[/center]

item.title: Rsc 224 [Data]
item.dc:creator: @Peter Peeter
item.description:
@Peter wrote:

[quote=“Ha xD funny, post:1, topic:324265”]Well if you look at the new rsc clients you will notice they have added a new cache format, preety funny if you ask me they are just using the same format to store the bzip data in as rs2. anyway i was researching the client abit and notice runescape are complete morons. reason why.

Old rsc:
Downloads data from say classic2.runescape.com/data/models36.jag
Lastest rsc
Downloads data from http://classic2.runescape.com/content9_1

As you see they have not changed much only the way its named out, but as anyone would no with a basic knowlage of the anything they would see that the data what is getting downloaded is the client’s storeage data. so i was wondering why the hell rs downloading the data files while there cache is not layed out like that anymore anyway one thing leads to a other

Before the data downloads the client checks if you have got the right crc32 keys say just for example your cache crc32 keys are 1, and then the client requests http://classic2.runescape.com/contentcrcsLOL <- contains the new crc32 keys. and there keys are 2 it will download the new cache files

Anyway so rs just downloads the new data files and then FROM the client injects the data files into the cache. morons

Name Jagex library http://classic2.runescape.com/content3_5 Name Configuration http://classic2.runescape.com/content0_2 Name 2d graphics http://classic2.runescape.com/content8_f Name people and monsters http://classic2.runescape.com/content1_1 Name member graphics http://classic2.runescape.com/content2_2 Name Textures http://classic2.runescape.com/content11_7 Name 3d models http://classic2.runescape.com/content9_f Name map http://classic2.runescape.com/content4_f Name members map http://classic2.runescape.com/content5_6 Name landscape http://classic2.runescape.com/content6_f Name members landscape http://classic2.runescape.com/content7_3 Name Sound effects http://classic2.runescape.com/content10_f
[center] T_x b muted[/center][/quote]

Quoted 4 Justice.
